Desc.eng: Stop there, gallant knight! My name is Lord Nyhelm, Supreme Commander of the Steel Legion. I'm on a sacred quest to obtain and wield the Reaper Blade of the Titans. Have you seen it?
Sorry. Your Legion was crushed more than 400 years ago.
No, I haven't seen the Reaper Blade.
Look, that blade is at least 4 times taller than you.
Nonsense! You will pay dearly for your mockery!
